column1: c. 900 – 870 BC#Echestratus#Expelled the Cynurensians that were in power.
c. 758 – 741 BC#Anaxandridas II#First Messenian War begins
c. 741 – 665 BC#Polydorus#First Messenian War ends; killed by the Spartan nobleman Polemarchus

column2: 409 – 395 BC#Pausanias#Helped restore democracy in Athens; Spartan hegemony

column1: c. 369 – 309 BC#Cleomenes II#Third Sacred War begins
c. 309 – 265 BC#Areus I#Killed in battle against Aristodemus
c. 254 – 242 BC#Leonidas II#Briefly deposed while in exile avoiding trial
c. 235 – 222 BC#Cleomenes III#Exiled after the Battle of Sellasia

column2: the dual monarchy remained vacant until Cleomenes III's death in 219.#Following the Battle of Sellasia
